featured.text: Moran’s watercolors—the first color renderings of the area—as well as Jackson’s photos and the survey results were presented to the Congress.
A man of multiple talents, Homer excelled equally in the arts of illustration, oil painting, and watercolor.
He is better known for his watercolors than his illustrations and oil paintings.

definition.zh_def: 水彩畫，一種使用水溶性顏料的繪畫技法。
definition.en_def: A painting method using pigments mixed with water, typically applied on paper.
definition.example: She created a beautiful landscape using watercolor.
